_sText:
New map I made with HDR lighting effect. 

If any of you guys know how to fix the double sun problem with out turning off the sun that ACTUALLY glares in your face when you look at it, pls tell me. 

Hope you all enjoy and if any problems with the spawns, let me know.

Also, in the middle of the map, in the "blue room", the combine fields are func_illusionary which means you can walk through them and where the say blade is kept, is a teleporter.

To get up to the topmost floor, get on the lift that is not obstructed with the floor that leads to the "blue room" and crouch-jump forward towards the brick wall when it is about to stop and voila! snipe to your hearts content.

Have fun while playing :)
